newsitem.title: USA: AccuStaff acquires laboratory staffing co.
newsitem.headline: AccuStaff acquires laboratory staffing co.

text.p: AccuStaff Inc said Monday that it has acquired Scientific Staffing Inc and the company's affiliated corporations.
Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
AccuStaff, which is seeking to complete a merger with Career Horizons Inc this year, said its new acquisition is its entry into providing professional staffing for laboratories.
"Our plans are to rapidy grow this line of business to over $100 million through new branch openings, acquisitions and cross-selling," AccuStaff Chief Executive Derek Dewan said in a release.

AccuStaff said Staffing's 1996 revenues are expected to be more than $20 million. Scientific's founder and chief executive, Robert Greene, will remain and lead AccuStaff's expansion in the area of laboratory staffing, the company said.
Scientific Staffing's clients include Merck & Co Inc and Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. It has branches in New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Maryland and Florida.
